intro: Sphagneticola × guangdongensis, commonly known as the Guangdong ironleaf, is a hybrid plant native to southern China. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its upright growth habit and lance-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, yellow flowers arranged in dense clusters, which are typical of the daisy family. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its attractive foliage and compact size. Sphagneticola × guangdongensis thrives in well-drained soil and partial to full sunlight.
